text:
DEPARTMENT OF
HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE
OFFICE OF EDUCATION
WASHINGTON 25. D. C.
September 21, 1962
Miss Marian Corwell, Chairman
NAEB Public Relations Committee
Henry Ford Museum and Greenfield Village
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Marian:
As best I can predict at this early date, I can be on hand
for your Public Relations Committee meeting in Philadelphia
on Sunday evening, October 21 at 7 o1clock.
In my present rush to get ready for an assignment in the
Middle West I can't seem to come up with one single suggestion
for "filler" material. When I simmer down a bit perhaps I can
put my mind to work on something that will be helpful. At
least I will try.
(Mrs.) Gertrude G. Broderick
Educational Media Specialist
ely yours,
